law.text: ________________________________________ FOOTNOTE(S): ________________________________________ --- (2) --- Editor's note: Article E to Ch. 2 of Pt. 2, which formerly pertained to similar subject matter, consisted of §§2-2071—2-2075, and derived from the 1959 Code, §14-37(a)—(c); Ord. No. 1982-28, §1, adopted Dec. 7, 1982; Ord. No. 1982-993, §1, adopted Oct. 5, 1982; and Ord. No. 1985-504, §1, adopted Mar. 5, 1985, was repealed by §1 of Ord. No. 1988-240, adopted Sept. 6, 1988, which ordinance further set out new §§2-2071—2074 to read as herein set out. (Back) Section 5 of Ord. No. 1988-240 specified an effective date of Jan. 2, 1989. (Back) Annotation: For automobile license tax provisions for the period January 1, 1989, through June 30, 1989, see uncodified ordinance 1988-241. (Back) Also, see S.L. 1988, Ch. 998. (Back)
